body.name: Toddler Sensory Kids Table with Lid | Sensory Bin | Kidoozie | Mega Block Compatible Lid | Indoor Outdoor Use , Red, G02521 17 x 12.5 x 11 inches

features: BRING HOME THE BEACH: If you don’t live near the beach, or maybe you just can’t get there enough, the Sand ‘n Splash table is the perfect toy to bring the beach to your back yard. Your kids can play in the sand and in the water with all kinds of beach toys, just like if they were there.

EASY CLEAN UP: When playtime is over just pack everything into the sand and water wells and place the lid on top eliminating it from taking up space in your yard and losing any pieces. It’s also perfect for taking on the go with you so you can have the beach anywhere, anytime.

GET CREATIVE: One of the beautiful things about trips to the beach is getting in touch with nature and getting creative with your activities. Allow your child the same relaxing experience with nature that they would get there, in their very own yard. They can build sand castles and splash in the water all day long.

WHERE FUN BEGINS: Kidoozie toys are engaging, educational and FUN. Our broad range of high-quality toys have won numerous awards and are safe and well designed. Innovative toys encourage movement, problem solving and pretend play through various themes. Stimulate the imagination and enable learning through play.

PRODUCT SPECIfICATIONS: Package contains (1) Kidoozie Sand ‘n Splash Activity Table by International Playthings. Includes 17.5” x 12.5” x 11” table with sand and water wells and removable legs, lip, bucket, shovel, rake, boat, and crab sand stamp. Recommended for children ages 2 years and up.
body.description: If you don’t live near the beach, or maybe you just can’t get there enough, the Sand ‘n Splash table is the perfect toy to bring the beach to your back yard. Your kids can play in the sand and in the water with all kinds of beach toys, just like if they were there. When playtime is over just pack everything into the sand and water wells and place the lid on top eliminating it from taking up space in your yard and losing any pieces. It’s also perfect for taking on the go with you so you can have the beach anywhere, anytime. One of the beautiful things about trips to the beach is getting in touch with nature and getting creative with your activities. Allow your child the same relaxing experience with nature that they would get there, in their very own yard. They can build sand castles and splash in the water all day long. Kidoozie toys are engaging, educational and FUN. Our broad range of high-quality toys have won numerous awards and are safe and well designed. Innovative toys encourage movement, problem solving and pretend play through various themes. Stimulate the imagination and enable learning through play. Package contains (1) Kidoozie Sand ‘n Splash Activity Table by International Playthings. Includes 17.5” x 12.5” x 11” table with sand and water wells and removable legs, lip, bucket, shovel, rake, boat, and crab sand stamp. Recommended for children ages 2 years and up.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 4,574 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Just add sand and water! Endless fun in the sun that promotes imaginative play and sensory exploration. Converts into a play table! Just put the lid on the table and store your accessories inside for a convenient play table. Create cute sand critters! Have a blast using the crab-shaped sand stamp to create your own sea life sand art.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Wanted to get something for my sons orbeez and this was perfect for it. Wish it was a little taller but other than that, great product, easy to setup and clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: This is a decent bin/table. Though table is a stretch bc it’s very short. My 2.5yr old has to sit to use it. Otherwise I think it’s great for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Kids love it!
reviews.reviewText: Bought as a gift for my 2-3 yr old nephews and they love it! It’s a little short for a child much older than that. However it can be used as a table top toy like on a picnic table. Or set it in the ground for them to sit and play with. Not the most stable though. It’s light so if you have a kiddo who likes to climb anything and everything then be aware.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Our 2 year old loves this!
reviews.reviewText: She has been playing with this for two days straight since we received it! As the other reviews state.. the table is small but my 2 year old has no issue sitting and playing with it! We put kinetic sand and a few other toys in it and she has thoroughly enjoyed this table so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too short for a 2 Year Old, but Simple and Works!
reviews.reviewText: It moves if pushed, so not really durable. But, if you use a stool it would work. It's too small for more than 1 kid to use at a time. It is brightly colored, easy to assemble, and simply put what you get for the money you pay. Check the dimensions if you consider this! It is NOT tall enough for a standing toddler to play with, the toddler will get on their knees to play in it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Baby Loves It!
reviews.reviewText: I got this after a beach trip because my 14 month old loved playing in the water. It was really easy to put together and nice and light. It is perfect to use with water outside and small/light enough to bring into the house during winter to play with. She is the perfect height right now to stand and play with it (30inches) but she will eventually have to sit to play with it when she is older. I have a lot of water toys so I chose this over a water table that comes with a lot of accessories and I like that I will be able to use it for other things since no toys are attached to it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I gifted this to a pair of toddler twins for Christmas, and they absolutely love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My toddler loves it!
reviews.reviewText: My toddler loves this and uses it everyday. She uses one side for kinetic sand and the other for her toys. I do wish it was a bit taller but it doesn’t bother her any
Es el regalo de navidad de mi hijo y a él le entretiene mucho jugar con la arena y el agua, se que le va a encantar

reviews.reviewTitle: Small, but great for a toddler
reviews.reviewText: This sensory table is small, but it is perfect for my 18 month old to kneel at, or remove the legs and set it on a table. Love that it comes with little sand toys. Great product for the price!
Es un poco pequeña pero a nosotros nos funciona perfectamente

Shorter than expected. The legs are only about 5” or so. However, I only wanted some sort of tray or bin to keep the kinetic sand off my dining room table. This for the bill perfectly. It’s easily moved, packed up and comes with lots of toys for a very reasonable price
Bonito, barto y entretenido, mis hijos pasan horas jugando
